overview: Stuart Guber has decided to drop back into society, by leaving his performance artist girlfriend and accepting a job working for a top record label. Trouble soon arises when his boss concocts the idea of doing a sex themed game show (hosted by character actor legend Dick Miller). Meanwhile, Stuart begins having an affair with the sister of the labelâ€™s new superstar (Thelma Houston).
tagline: Meet the Naughty Young Girls who do their best work AT NIGHT --
title: Game Show Models
